name: Rotatio Rotatioe
description:
Rotatio Rotatioe

This is my submission for the Kenney game jam 2021,

Controls are simple, either rotate left and right using the left and right keys, or use the buttons on the screen if on mobile.

Rotate the world around you and collect all the coins in the 10 levels!

The coins on the tutorial screen count  for your final total btw.

Have fun!
